name: Sorbet with Champagne
description: This rhubarb champagne with strawberry sorbet is just the perfect drink for a relaxed summer night! Enjoy it on your balcony or in your garden after a long day of work. It's sparkly, fruity, and super easy to make.Â
recipeIngredient: 4 scoops strawberry sorbet ((one scoop per glass))

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the champagne with the rhubarb juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the champagne with the rhubarb juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill into 4 glasses and add one scoop of sorbet, a quartered strawberry, and fresh mint to each glass.
